dict.string: on listTabs() set tabInfo to {} tell application "Google Chrome" repeat with aWindow in windows set tabCounter to 0 repeat with aTab in tabs of aWindow set tabCounter to tabCounter + 1 set end of tabInfo to ¬ {tabIndex:tabCounter, windowId:(id of aWindow), tabUrl:(URL of aTab), tabTitle:(title of aTab)} ¬ as record end repeat end repeat end tell return tabInfo end listTabs -- https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/LanguagesUtilities/Conceptual/MacAutomationScriptingGuide/ManipulateText.html on findAndReplaceInText(theText, theSearchString, theReplacementString) set AppleScript's text item delimiters to theSearchString set theTextItems to every text item of theText set AppleScript's text item delimiters to theReplacementString set theText to theTextItems as string set AppleScript's text item delimiters to "" return theText end findAndReplaceInText on jsonSafeString(str) return findAndReplaceInText(str, "\"", "\\\"") end jsonSafeString on findTab(searchTerm) tell application "Google Chrome" repeat with aWindow in windows set tabCounter to 0 repeat with aTab in tabs of aWindow set tabCounter to tabCounter + 1 if ((URL of aTab) contains searchTerm) or ((title of aTab) contains searchTerm) then tell application "Google Chrome" to activate if index of aWindow is not 1 then set visible of aWindow to true set index of aWindow to 1 end if set active tab index of aWindow to tabCounter tell application "System Events" to tell process "Google Chrome" set pWindowCounter to 0 repeat with pWindow in windows set pWindowCount to pWindowCounter + 1 try if (title of pWindow as string) = (title of aWindow) then exit repeat end if on error errStr number errNum log (errStr) log (errNum) end try end repeat perform action "AXRaise" of window pWindowCounter end tell return end if end repeat end repeat end tell end findTab on run argv set command to "listtabs" try if (item 1 of argv) is "findtab" then set command to "findtab" end if on error errStr number errNum end try if command = "listtabs" then set tabList to listTabs() set tabListLength to length of tabList set output to "{ \"items\": [" repeat with i from 1 to tabListLength set tabRecord to item i of tabList set output to output & "{\"title\":\"" & jsonSafeString(tabTitle of tabRecord) & ¬ "\",\"subtitle\":\"" & jsonSafeString(tabUrl of tabRecord) & "\"}" if i is not tabListLength then set output to output & "," end if end repeat return output & "]}" end if end run
